overview: Brett Nicol, CEO of San Francisco-based Forgetful Gentleman and Empower the Athlete is a business development professional who earned his MBA at the University of Virginia and his BA at Amherst College. A former NCAA football and baseball player, Brett has extended his passion for sports and his proclivity to arrive tardy into two successful startups. He was recognized as a “top entrepreneur” in 2009 and 2010 by Businessweek.
